messages.subject: TV program:The Japanese favorite greatest people 100
messages.msgSnippet: Did anybody watch the show? http://www.ntv.co.jp/ijin/ Here is the top 10 ranking. 1.Oda Nobunaga 2.Sakamoto Ryouma 3.Edison 4.Toyotomi Hideyoshi 5.Matsushita
messages.messageBody:
Did anybody watch the show? http://www.ntv.co.jp/ijin/
Here is the top 10 ranking.
1.Oda Nobunaga
2.Sakamoto Ryouma
3.Edison
4.Toyotomi Hideyoshi
5.Matsushita Kounosuke
6.Tokugawa Ieyasu
7.Noguchi Hideyo
8.Mother Teresa
9.Helen Keller
10.Hijikata Toshizo




shikisokuzeku
